back-in-stock.title: Back In Stock Inquiry
back-in-stock.intro: We will try our best to get you the size you want. Select a size and we'll email you if we get more in!

preorder-notify.title: Back In Stock Inquiry
preorder-notify.intro: This item is available for PREORDER. We'll email you when we have it in stock!

special-order.title: Special Order Inquiry
special-order.intro: We will contact the manufacturer to see if the item is available for special order. This service absolutely FREE and there is no obligation to make a purchase.

thank-you-email.intro: We will email you at Name@email.com if this item becomes available.

thank-you-submitted.intro: Your inquiry was successfully submitted, and we will get back to you in 5-10 days.
